text: Fallin Brothers Building is a historic commercial building located at Springfield, Greene County, Missouri. It was built about 1919, and is a large two-story, brick building on a concrete foundation. It has open storefronts and large garage doors on the ground floor and a corbelled brick cornice. (includes 14 photographs from 2011-2012) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2012. ==References== Category:Commercial buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Commercial buildings completed in 1919 Category:Buildings and structures in Springfield, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Greene County, Missouri
title: Fallin Brothers Building
